Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photos show American actor Robert Downey Jr. on the set of the 2008 superhero film Iron Man, not a dying Hindu man attacked by Muslims.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that a Hindu man was attacked by Muslims and needs treatment.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photos in the Facebook post depict a real incident of a Hindu man being attacked by Muslims, which is not true.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the photos are from the movie Iron Man and have no connection to a real-life incident involving religious violence.
